title: We shall remember them

abstract: 'A place of peace and beauty that belongs to all Australians.'
description: John Thompson remembers the generations of soldiers that have passed through the Australian Light Horse Memorial Park in Seymour. While honouring their memory, he also welcomes the restoration of the park to create a place of beauty for all future Australians.
